title: Scholz and Xi agree Russia would cross a line with nuclear weapons in Ukraine
description: After a meeting with Xi in Beijing, Germany's Chancellor Olaf Scholz said the two leaders agreed that with the use of nuclear weapons, Russia would cross a line drawn by the international community.
